titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania LJS 293: al-Bayān wa al-tidhkār fī ṣanʻat ʻamal al-ghubār.

availability.licence: These images and the content of Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts LJS 293: al-Bayān wa al-tidhkār fī ṣanʻat ʻamal al-ghubār. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Title from title page and introduction (f. 1r, 1v).

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: On calculation with integers and fractions; a copy of a work composed in the Maghrib; some marginal notations.

msItem.title: al-Bayān wa al-tidhkār fī ṣanʻat ʻamal al-ghubār.
البيان و التذكار في صنعة عمل الغبار

respStmt.persName: Ṭūsī, Naṣīr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1201-1274
طوسي، نصير الدين محمد بن محمد،
Baghdādī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Mujill
بغدادي، محمد بن عبد الله بن المجل،

supportDesc.extent: 86 leaves : 232 x 165 (164 x 114) mm. bound to 234 x 175 mm

collation.p: Paper, i + 86 + i; 1⁸ 2¹² 3⁸ 4¹² 5⁸ 6¹² 7⁸ 8¹² 9⁶. Catchwords on each leaf, lower left verso.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; partially pointed.

binding.p: Early calf over paper boards, blind-stamped with central four-lobed medallion and rolled double frame with text in the outer frame.

origin.p: Copied by Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Mujill al-Baghdādī at al-Madrasah al-Niẓāmīyah in Baghdad, completed A.H. Safar 590 (Jan.-Feb. 1194, f. 86r).

history.provenance: Formerly owned by Naṣīr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī (owner's statement, f.1r).
Formerly owned by ʻAlī ibn Thaʻlab (Taghlib) al-Sāʻātī al-Baghdādī, (owner's statement, f. 1r).
Sold at auction at Christie's, 20 Apr. 1999, lot 320, to Lawrence J. Schoenberg.
Deposit by Lawrence J. Schoenberg and Barbara Brizdle, 2011.
